About Videos Softwares

FortressBot

The bane of server invite links and hoisters


Add to your server


HQ/Support

Documentation

Primarily built for moderation

  • Administration
    • User moderation (mute, temp mute, kick, ban, mass-kick, mass-ban, role management, etc.)
    • Server moderation (message mass-prune, pinning messages, export channel history, etc.)
  • InviteNuke (The automatic invite link remover)
    • Activate or deactivate the InviteNuke
    • Set invite exceptions
    • Set role exceptions
    • Set channel exceptions
    • Logging all InviteNuke actions
  • Lockdown [UNDER CONSTRUCTION]
    • Channel lock
    • Server lock
  • NameWash (Auto-dehoist and ascii-fy of usernames by assigning a cleaned version as their nicknames)
    • Activate or deactivate the NameWash
    • Set different wash modes between ASCIIfy, dehoist or both
    • Set what characters are considered as hoisting
    • Logging all NameWash actions

With various secondary utilities

  • Utility (a large collection of discord related utility commands)
    • User, server, channel and role information lookup
    • Emote magnification
    • ..and much more
  • Technical (a collection of commands for non-discord technical utilities)
    • Character information lookup
    • String utilities
    • ...and others
  • Entertainment (The ubiquitous fun commands)
    • 1v1
    • rate
    • roll
    • ...and many more

Further support and donations are always appreciated <3
